Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Resurrection:

Text.Language: <ouab P[oic ouoh k~c~marwout: ak[i m~kah ouoh m~pekjwnt: aktwnk e~bol qen n/eymwout: qen pie~hoou m~mah somt.
You are Holy O Lord and blessed, for You suffered and were not angered, You rose from the dead, on the third day.
